```{r load_data, message=FALSE}
sce.seq$embryo_z = paste0(sce.seq$embryo, "_", sce.seq$z)

meta$embryo_z = paste0(meta$embryo, "_", meta$z)

# add lognorm by area and cosineNorm by area
# add log normalized by area
getAreaFactorsDirectly = function(sce, transform = NULL) {
  # sce is a SingleCellExperiment object
  # transform is a function
  meta = colData(sce)
  counts = assay(sce, "counts")
  if (!is.null(transform)) {
    sizeFactors.area <- transform(meta$Area)/mean(transform(meta$Area))
  } else {
    sizeFactors.area <- meta$Area/mean(meta$Area)
  }
  logcounts.area <- log2(t(t(counts)/sizeFactors.area) + 1)
  return(list(sizeFactors = sizeFactors.area,
              logcounts.area = logcounts.area))
}
out_area = getAreaFactorsDirectly(sce.seq)
assay(sce.seq, "logcounts.area") <- out_area[["logcounts.area"]]
assay(sce.seq, "cosineNorm.area") <- cosineNorm(assay(sce.seq, "logcounts.area"))


# load atlas 
sce.atlas = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/reducedAtlas/E8_25__E8_5.rds"))
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[rownames(sce.seq), ]
sce.atlas <- computeSumFactors(sce.atlas)
sce.atlas <- scater::normalize(sce.atlas)
assay(sce.atlas, "cosineNorm") <- cosineNorm(logcounts(sce.atlas))

# seq and atlas
sce.seq = sce.seq[order(rownames(sce.seq)),]
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[order(rownames(sce.atlas)),]

sce.joint = cbind(assay(sce.seq, "cosineNorm.area"), assay(sce.atlas, "cosineNorm"))
batchFactor = factor(c(as.character(sce.seq$embryo_pos_z), as.character(sce.atlas$sample)))


```

# Map onto atlas

```{r map-atlas, message=FALSE}

n.neigh = 25
nPC = 100
genes = rownames(sce.joint)

stat.corr.seq2atlas = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.sce.joint = sce.joint[!rownames(sce.joint) == current.gene, ]
  mbpca = multiBatchPCA(current.sce.joint, batch = batchFactor, d = 10)
  out = do.call(reducedMNN, mbpca)
  joint.pca = out$corrected
  current.knns = queryKNN( joint.pca[colnames(sce.atlas),], joint.pca[colnames(sce.seq),], k = 50, 
                           get.index = TRUE, get.distance = FALSE)
  cells.mapped = t(apply(current.knns$index, 1, function(x) colnames(sce.atlas)[x]))
  current.mapping = lapply(1:dim(sce.seq)[2], function(x){
    out = list(cells.mapped = cells.mapped[x,])
    return(out)
  })
  names(current.mapping) = colnames(sce.seq)
  
  # impute
  current.sce.atlas = sce.atlas[rownames(sce.atlas) == current.gene, ]
  current.counts.atlas = data.frame(uniqueID = colnames(current.sce.atlas), logcounts = as.numeric( logcounts(current.sce.atlas )))
  
  current.sce.seq = sce.seq[rownames(sce.seq) == current.gene, ]
  logcounts.seq = assay(current.sce.seq, "logcounts.area")
  current.counts.seq = data.frame(uniqueID = colnames(current.sce.seq), logcounts.seq = as.numeric( logcounts.seq ))
  
  
  estimated.counts.mean.per_nn = sapply(current.mapping, function(x){
    cells = x$cells.mapped
    cells = cells[1:n.neigh]
    out = mean( current.counts.atlas$logcounts[current.counts.atlas$uniqueID %in% cells])
    return(out) 
  })
  estimated.counts.mean.per_nn = data.frame(uniqueID = names(estimated.counts.mean.per_nn), logcounts.imputed = estimated.counts.mean.per_nn)
  estimated.counts.mean.per_nn = merge(estimated.counts.mean.per_nn, meta, all.x = T)
  estimated.counts.mean.per_nn =  merge(estimated.counts.mean.per_nn, current.counts.seq, all.x = T)
    
  
  # get correlation stat
  # calc correlations: per embryo/z; all cells + per CTs
  unq.embryo_z = unique(meta$embryo_z)
  
  # all
  stat.all = sapply(unq.embryo_z, function(i){
    current.df = estimated.counts.mean.per_nn[estimated.counts.mean.per_nn$embryo_z == i,]
    return(cor(current.df$logcounts.seq, current.df$logcounts.imputed, method = "pearson"))
  })
  stat.all = data.frame(embryo_z = names(stat.all), corr.all = stat.all)
  
  # per CT
  unq.CT = unique(meta$celltype_mapped)
  stat.perCT = sapply(unq.embryo_z, function(i){
    out = sapply(unq.CT, function(i.CT){
       current.df = estimated.counts.mean.per_nn[estimated.counts.mean.per_nn$embryo_z == i & 
                                                  estimated.counts.mean.per_nn$celltype_mapped == i.CT,]
  
       return(cor(current.df$logcounts.seq, current.df$logcounts.imputed, method = "pearson"))
    })
    names(out) = paste0("corr.", unq.CT)
    return(out)
  })
  stat.perCT = data.frame(t(stat.perCT))
  stat.perCT = rownames_to_column(stat.perCT, var = "embryo_z")
  
  # merge
  stat = merge(stat.all, stat.perCT, by = "embryo_z")
  stat$gene = current.gene
  return(stat)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)

saveRDS(stat.corr.seq2atlas, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/stat_corr_seq2atlas.rds"))
```
